mapper.update:
update share_turnover_rate
ID_SHARE_INFO = #{idShareInfo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEW_RATE = #{newRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THREE_CHANGE_RATE = #{threeChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIVE_CHANGE_RATE = #{fiveChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEN_CHANGE_RATE = #{tenChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THREE_RATE = #{threeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIVE_RATE = #{fiveRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEN_RATE = #{tenRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID_TURNOVER_RATE = #{idTurnoverRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update share_turnover_rate set ID_SHARE_INFO = #{idShareInfo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NEW_RATE = #{newRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, THREE_CHANGE_RATE = #{threeChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIVE_CHANGE_RATE = #{fiveChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEN_CHANGE_RATE = #{tenChangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, THREE_RATE = #{threeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIVE_RATE = #{fiveRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TEN_RATE = #{tenRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID_TURNOVER_RATE = #{idTurnoverRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select s.SHARE_CODE shareCode, s.SHARE_NAME shareName, r.NEW_RATE newRate, r.THREE_CHANGE_RATE threeChangeRate, r.FIVE_CHANGE_RATE fiveChangeRate, r.TEN_CHANGE_RATE tenChangeRate, r.THREE_RATE threeRate, r.FIVE_RATE fiveRate, r.TEN_RATE tenRate, r.CREATE_TIME, r.UPDATE_TIME from share_turnover_rate r inner join share_info s on r.ID_SHARE_INFO=s.ID_SHARE_INFO order by THREE_CHANGE_RATE desc
